name: Linklings
description:
First game, made for Brackeys Game Jame 2021.1

What's stronger than chains when linked together? Linklings!

Only 5 levels available due to the time limit, but was very interesting to work on.

Please leave a comment if you enjoyed the game, or if you didn't. Critisize me so that I may improve towards my goal of becoming a game dev someday :)

Thanks for playing!

P.S. All game assets were made by me. If you think something looks/sounds similar to something by someone else, please let me know so I can review/change it. 

Pixel art palette used - Modified version of Ressurect 64 from Lospec

Original version of palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/resurrect-64

CONTROLS

Select a Linkling by clicking on it.

Move with WASD. Jump with Space.

Press Q to enter linking mode. Press it again to exit.
While in linking mode, press the WASD buttons in the direction of the linkling you want to link to!

Hold E and click on a link icon to break the link between two Linklings.

Linked Linklings can't jump or climb.

TIPS

Restart if all your Linklings die or you can't complete a level with the Linklings you have.

Linklings can't swim!
